channel.title: PlayerUnknown's Forum Fortnite Battle Royale (Officially The Worst Thing I have ever made)
channel.description:
## Welcome to the worst thing I have ever done. Forum Fortnite PUBG H1Z1 the battle royale genre is overrated thing. (calling it fortnite so I can clickbait people into the game as it's relevant rn ;) )
### Rules All standard forum rules apply here Actions are to be sent via your DM. No ghosting or revealling private information in the thread.
### Gameplay When the game has started, the map will be announced by me in the thread.
You will pick to drop at a certain spot which is signified on the map that is in a specified drop zone. (shaded in blue)
The play zone will be determined once everyone has dropped at their locations. (It will be announced publicly)
You will only be able to move locations twice until other players have done their location moving.
### Battling Other Players You will be alerted if you can see another player within a certain radius of you.
Battling is turn based, so you can move your location when you are battling when it is your turn Battles will happen from dice rolls and different guns determine different stuff (like range and shit like that).
Building is enabled just because why the frick not. use /break to break nearby objects and you will get the closest to the resource it is made of.
You can carry up to 5 weapons and 3 healing/shield items (because I don't like fortain's inventory system and adding backpacks is too complex.)
### Looting You will be told if loot is near you at any time you ask
### Deaths On your death, you can choose to display a note. You can also choose to bring a note with all your kills
Players will drop all their loot on their death
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Players: 1. Memesky 2. eevee 3. Maximus 4. Firekitten 5. Whammerist 6. MtheJoker 7. **H**ot**t**imetravelling**m**exicans 8. Strangle 9. 10.
# See you in hell everyone. I hate myself even more for making this
[quote="orangeandblack5, post:4, topic:62601, full:true"] Come on it needs to be 100 [/quote]
We do not have 100 people on our forum.
I would do it if we had numbers
## Graveyard + Placings
